alert.note: Alert for Del Norte Interior; Northeastern Mendocino Interior; Northern Humboldt Interior; Northern Lake County; Northern Trinity; Northwestern Mendocino Interior; Southern Humboldt Interior; Southern Lake County; Southern Trinity; Southwestern Humboldt (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 03 at 10:19PM PST until March 05 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM SATURDAY TO 4 PM PST SUNDAY ABOVE 1000 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected above 1000 feet. Total snow accumulations ranging from 7 inches near 1000 feet to 24 inches across higher ridges. Snow may accumulate at elevations below 1000 feet, particularly in northern Mendocino, interior Humboldt, and Trinity counties. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph on ridgetops. * WHERE...Interior Humboldt, interior Del Norte, northern and northwestern Mendocino, Lake, and Trinity counties. * WHEN...From 4 AM Saturday to 4 PM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state of California can be obtained by calling 1-800-GAS-ROAD.
